channel.title: About on Nicholas Yek
channel.description: Recent content in About on Nicholas Yek

item.title: Computer Engineering (B.Eng Hons), National University of Singapore
item.description: Career & Achievements First class honours CAPT Honour Roll AY22/23 Top Students for Software Engineering & Object-Oriented Programming (CS2113) Top Students for Engineering Principles and Practice 1 (CG1111A) Teaching & Outreach CG1111A, AY23/24 Semester 1 - Teaching Assistant CG1111A, AY22/23 Semester 1 - Teaching Assistant CDE Open Day 2023 Lab Assistant ECE Open Day 2023 Lab Assistant ECE Lab Tour 2022 Lab Assistant

item.title: FindNUS :telescope:
item.description: Executive Summary: Awarded the highest level of achivement, given to the top 7% of teams (top 29 of 414 teams) for NUS School of Computing’s 2022 iteration of Orbital. FindNUS is a lost and found web app built during Summer 2022 Orbital. As the backend developer, I built a RESTful API backend using a microservices architecture. Apart from regular CRUD, we also used some NLP and fuzzy searching to help lost people find their lost stuff.

item.title: ResistorPrediction :robot:
item.description: Executive Summary: An experimental attempt to predict resistor values based on pictures of resistors. Powered by machine learning and OpenCV. Achieved up to 60% accuracy in predictions (not exactly production ready). 🔸 Project Link 🚧 Project write-up in progress…

item.title: SnipNScan :camera:
item.description: Executive Summary: Using OpenCV and Tesseract, I built a QR code and text scanner because too much text in this world is embedded in images and are un-copypasteable. Think of images of code. 🔸 Project Blogpost 🔸 Project Link

item.title: Software Developer Intern
item.description: HackerTrail uses data-driven technology to evaluate and connect software professionals to employers. Developed new features and many UI changes on the “Assessment Platform” using React, driving a successful UX revamp Analysed competitors and collected user feedback to identify high business value features missing on the platform Built an exploratory backend API using FastAPI to automate company messaging processes Tested with some frontend frameworks to test their SEO effectiveness for the company’s landing page Recommendation by my team lead on my SWE skills.

item.title: Software Engineer Intern
item.description: The NCS Things of AI (ToAI) platform is a customizable, end-to-end solution for enterprise & government IOT needs. Developed customizable data visualisation capabilities by integrating third party APIs into the platform using Angular Generated time-series data visualisation reports for over 32k IOT devices using PostgreSQL and PowerBI Proposed an Agile-based project implementation schedule to support a Tender bid submission Testimonial & Award Nomination by my supervisor, Hsu Yee.

item.title: Software Engineer Intern
item.description: TOFFS provides Multi-CDN and cybersecurity solutions for Enterprise networking. Integrated an Anti-DDoS machine learning (ML) script into network infrastructure, enabling smart IP blacklisting Processed big data (up to 2.5TB) efficiently using concurrent programming to train dozens of ML models Optimised ML training with code refactoring and hardware acceleration, achieving up to 50% reduction in training time Testimonial on my work by Co-Founder Jason Kong.
